description: The French president faces questions over whether he himself followed social distancing measures.
title: Did France's Emmanuel Macron break his own Covid rules?
title_page: Did France's Emmanuel Macron break his own Covid rules? - BBC News
maintext: Despite his condition, he has held several meetings via-videoconferencing. He said he would continue to focus on "priority" issues such as the pandemic and Brexit and he would continue managing day-to-day affairs with the prime minister, the government and his teams.
